Name: test_NAF_7_4_0_Edit_Profile
Description:
Test that a user with admin role can access the profile page and edit profile information.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
6. Click the profile button
7. Verify that the user is on the profile page
8. Click the edit profile button
9. Enter the new profile information
10. Click the save button
11. Verify that the profile information is updated

Name: test_NAF_3_3_0_edit_profile_picture
Description:
Test Case: NAF-40
    As a registered user I can view and update profile image
    Scenario: Edit Profile Picture
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Click on "Take a picture" button (might not stable on simulator)
    5. Select a photo from the device
    
    Note: This test is skipped because camera functionality is not supported in the current simulator

Name: test_CMS_11_2_0_Mark_First_Notification_As_Read
Description:
Test Case 201: Verify the "Mark as read" button functionality.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Mark the first notification as read
5. Verify notification status changes

Name: test_NAF_9_2_0_View_Programs_List
Description:
Test that an admin user can view all programs list.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Verify programs list is displayed
5. Verify all programs are accessible

Name: test_NAF_7_2_0_Login_As_Admin
Description:
Test that a user with admin role can login to the content management platform 
using the same credentials as for the mobile app.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in

Name: test_NAF_9_1_0_Navigate_To_Programs_Section
Description:
Test that an admin user can navigate to the program section of the app through the side menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section via side menu
4. Verify successful navigation to programs section

Name: test_NAF_7_3_0_Logout_of_AdminPanel
Description:
Test that a user with admin role can successfully log out from the CMS.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
6. Click the logout button
7. Verify that the user is logged out

Name: test_NAF_9_3_0_Search_Program
Description:
Test that an admin user can search program by program's title.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Search for the created program by title
6. Verify search results display the correct program

Name: test_NAF_2_2_0_successful_login
Description:
Test Case: NAF-12
    As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
    Scenario: Successful Login
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app
    2. Click on "Log in" button
    3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
    4. Enter valid email and password
    5. Click "Log in" button
    6. Verify successful login
    
    Expected Result: User should be successfully logged in and redirected to the main app

Name: test_CMS_11_1_0_Verify_Notifications_Page
Description:
Test Case 199: Verify the notifications page loads correctly.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Verify tabs are displayed correctly
5. Verify table headers are present
6. Verify notification rows are loaded

Name: test_NAF_3_2_0_update_bio
Description:
Test Case: NAF-37, NAF-39
    As a registered user I can view and update my bio
    Scenario: Update Bio
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Enter bio content
    5. Click on "Save" button
    6. Verify bio content is updated
    
    Expected Result: Bio content is updated

Name: test_CMS_11_3_0_Switch_Between_Tabs
Description:
Test Case 202: Verify the switching between "Unread" and "Read" tabs.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Switch to Read tab
5. Switch to Unread tab
6. Verify tab switching works correctly
